description: This brief course is the starting point for a lifetime of success in having the right stuff inside you every day in the most convenient and economical formula. For anyone who needs to lose weight or just wants to live a healthier lifestyle for themselves and their family. This is an introduction to a completely new kind of lifestyle where you will learn how to become a vegetarian and how to get your family to become vegetarian - BUT without eating any vegetables. By changing one's diet away from the typical America processed food diet filled with chemicals, pesticides, hormones, GMO's etc. and by getting all of the nutrition that your cells must have every day to thrive, grow - and fight disease you get back to the kind of life that you had when you were younger.
title: How To Lose Weight Without Dieting
